item.title: Which pretrained backbone to choose
item.description: In 2020 which architecture should I use for my image classification/tracking/segmentation/… task? I was asked on an interview that and I didn’t have a prepared answer. I made a small research and want to write down some thoughts. Most of the architectures build upon ideas from ResNet paper Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition, 2015 Here is some explanation of resnet family:An Overview of ResNet and its Variants by Vincent Fung, 2017.
